meanings.definition: To make changes to the appearance of a room or building by adding new paint, furniture, etc.
meanings.sent1: She is redecorating her bedroom with colorful curtains and a new rug.
meanings.sent2: They spent the weekend redecorating the living room with fresh paint and plants.
meanings.sent3: After redecorating the kitchen, it felt like a whole new space for cooking.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like redecorating a blank canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The act of redecorating transformed the dull room into a cozy retreat.

meanings.definition: The act of renovating or updating the decor of a space.
meanings.sent1: The redecorating of the office brought a modern touch to the workspace.
meanings.sent2: We hired a team to handle the redecorating of the entire house.
meanings.sent3: The sudden redecorating of the classroom surprised all the students.
meanings.sent4: The redecorating of the garden was like a breath of fresh air for the house.
meanings.sent5: The redecorating project resulted in a stylish and inviting atmosphere.
